com.compendium.core.db
Class DBUser

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBUser

public class DBUser
extends java.lang.Object

The DBUser class serves as the interface layer between the UserProfile objects and the User table in the database.

Author:
Rema Natarajan / Michelle Bachler

Method Detail

insert

public static UserProfile insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                                 java.lang.String sUserID,
                                 java.lang.String sAuthor,
                                 java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                                 java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                                 java.lang.String sLoginName,
                                 java.lang.String sUserName,
                                 java.lang.String sPassword,
                                 java.lang.String sUserDescription,
                                 java.lang.String sHomeViewID,
                                 boolean isAdministrator,
                                 java.lang.String sLinkViewID,
                                 int iActiveStatus)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new user profile in the table and returns it.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sUserID - the id of the new user.
sAuthor - the author name of the new user.
dCreationDate - the creation date for the new user.
dModificationDate - the last modification date for the new user (same as creation).
sLoginName - the login name of the new user.
sUserName - the user name of the new user.
sPassword - the password for the new user.
sUserDescription - the description of the new user.
sHomeViewID - the id of the new user's home view.
isAdministrator - is this new user an administrator?
sLinkViewID - the id of the user's inbox.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
public static UserProfile update(DBConnection dbcon,
                                 java.lang.String sUserID,
                                 java.lang.String sAuthor,
                                 java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                                 java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                                 java.lang.String sLoginName,
                                 java.lang.String sUserName,
                                 java.lang.String sPassword,
                                 java.lang.String sUserDescription,
                                 java.lang.String sHomeViewID,
                                 boolean isAdministrator,
                                 java.lang.String sLinkViewID,
                                 int iActiveStatus)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Updates a user profile in the table and returns it.

Parameters:
DBConnection - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sUserID - the id of the user to update.
sAuthor - the author name of the user.
dCreationDate - the creation date for the user.
dModificationDate - the last modification date for the user.
sLoginName - the login name of the user.
sUserName - the user name of the user.
sPassword - the password for the user.
sUserDescription - the description of the user.
sHomeViewID - the id of the user's home view.
isAdministrator - is this user an administrator?
sLinkViewID - the id of the user's inbox.
Returns:
boolean true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getUserProfileFromID

public static UserProfile getUserProfileFromID(DBConnection dbcon,
                                               java.lang.String sUserID)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a user profile in the table. Only this API doesnt take a session object as this is called before a session object is created

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

Parameters:

Returns:
String sUserName - the Name field from the User table for the given UserID
